scene.name: intro
scene.line: It may not be a draw on its own, but the food is certainly passable!
Most of us never leave the premises, anyway.

scene.name: why-not-leave
scene.line: Well, we strive to avoid unnecessary downtime.

scene.name: food
scene.line: Oh, mostly corn. One acquires a taste for the local dishes, as one does anywhere.
It's become a matter of comfort. The food, and simply to eat here. To `be` here.

scene.name: come-and-go
scene.line: Besides, if we were all coming and going three times a day, we'd surely attract the wrong kind of attention! Can't tax what you can't see, now ...
